message: The particular need for an sprintf routine arose out of the need to add comas to numbers. And while I've used javascript to perform the formatting it would be nice to have the library as a part of the KRL platform.

Instead of waiting that requests get magically acknowledged, for me the N°1 priority is to get access to KNS engine source code so we can commit patches. Begging, explaining/convincing why something is necessary is a frustrating and time consuming task. I'd rather like to use this time coding the functionality by myself and let developers choose if they want to use it or not.

@loic We are not intending you to explain/convince/beg. We are developing as fast as we can, and your feedback helps us prioritize. And yes, we are looking forward to an open source Kinetic engine as well.
Ed, see http://docs.kynetx.com/docs/Sprintf  This is not yet rolled to production. Will go out next time Mark rolls code.
